org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.replication

类 ReplicationPeerConfigUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.replication.ReplicationPeerConfigUtil

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Stable
public final class ReplicationPeerConfigUtil
extends Object
    Helper for TableCFs Operations.

      • convertToString

      • convert

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.ReplicationProtos.TableCF[] convert(String tableCFsConfig)
        Convert string to TableCFs Object. This is only for read TableCFs information from TableCF node. Input String Format: ns1.table1:cf1,cf2;ns2.table2:cfA,cfB;ns3.table3.

      • convert

        public static String convert(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.ReplicationProtos.TableCF[] tableCFs)
        Convert TableCFs Object to String. Output String Format: ns1.table1:cf1,cf2;ns2.table2:cfA,cfB;table3

      • getTableCF

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.ReplicationProtos.TableCF getTableCF(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.ReplicationProtos.TableCF[] tableCFs,
                                                                                                     String table)
        Get TableCF in TableCFs, if not exist, return null.

      • parseTableCFs

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.ReplicationProtos.TableCF[] parseTableCFs(byte[] bytes)
                                                                                                   throws IOException
        Parse bytes into TableCFs. It is used for backward compatibility. Old format bytes have no PB_MAGIC Header
        抛出:
        IOException

      • parseTableCFsFromConfig

        public static Map<TableName,List<String>> parseTableCFsFromConfig(String tableCFsConfig)
        Convert tableCFs string into Map.

        Convert tableCFs Object to Map.

      • parsePeerFrom

        public static ReplicationPeerConfig parsePeerFrom(byte[] bytes)
                                           throws DeserializationException
        参数:
        bytes - Content of a peer znode.
        返回:
        ClusterKey parsed from the passed bytes.
        抛出:
        DeserializationException

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig)
        参数:
        peerConfig -
        返回:
        Serialized protobuf of peerConfig with pb magic prefix prepended suitable for use as content of a this.peersZNode; i.e. the content of PEER_ID znode under /hbase/replication/peers/PEER_ID

      • getPeerClusterConfiguration

        public static org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration getPeerClusterConfiguration(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                                               ReplicationPeerDescription peer)
                                                                        throws IOException
        Returns the configuration needed to talk to the remote slave cluster.
        参数:
        conf - the base configuration
        peer - the description of replication peer
        返回:
        the configuration for the peer cluster, null if it was unable to get the configuration
        抛出:
        IOException - when create peer cluster configuration failed
